org.jwave.model.player

Interface MetaDataManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetaDataManagerImpl

    public interface MetaDataManager
    A meta data retriever manages metadata contained in an audio file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Sets a value for a meta data.
      void writeMetaDataToFile()
      This method effectively writes the new metaData into the file.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieve

        java.lang.String retrieve(MetaData metaDataValue)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a String specifing the meta data value.

      • getAlbumArtwork

        java.util.Optional<java.io.InputStream> getAlbumArtwork()
        Returns:
